content.rendered:
FOSS4G-Asia 2023 Seoul team is going to attend the global FOSS4 for the promotion of Asia event. We’ve printed promotional t-shirts for FOSS4G-Asia 2023 Seoul conference. Starting next week, we will wear these t-shirts in Prizren, Kosovo, where the global FOSS4G conference will take place, and proudly showcase them throughout the venue.

Please ping us when you see us!
